sub_title: Unilever - Brand & Innovation Magnum Ice Cream
summary:
Brand Building & Innovation project specialist, strong background in FMCG both from agency and in-house, a person who brings creative problem solving skills and details orientation to unlock all opportunities and challenges. 

Hey there, I started my professional career in the Communication & Marketing industry since I was 17 in Vietnam. My life took a new turn as I moved to The Netherlands & Italy for my Master's, and it has always been challenging yet never less exciting. I truly embrace the entrepreneurship mindset in all the jobs I do, because taking fast actions & trial will be the only way to know if it works.

I wish to accomplish my deeper goals of bridging the relationship with consumers through purposeful & innovative products & services. In the end i'm also a consumer, and I love everything that's convenient, beautiful & long lasting.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 1248, 'name': 'Unilever', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF6TJKa56uLAg/company-logo_400_400/0/1663661969458?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=YnBfRWG5HlUuJxKelTb56FoVBIORXOSDJMzROxGDhNw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unilever/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Unilever', 'description': "Independently manage the Magnum Mini Range as the fastest growing segment of the brand, worth of 153M EUR (2021) across Europe. Launched 2 Future Core Innovations of Magnum Mini Cookie Collection (2022) and Magnum Mini Caramel Collection (2023) by end 2023. Created Trade Story, 6Ps analysis and managed executions with Local teams. Adapted ATL, BTL assets with global and local marketing and customer development teams. 

Lead Magnum Bites new segment in Europe. Successfully pitched & obtained a significant project Investment grant in Jan 2023 with Global Brand and cross-functional teams. 

Managed complete Europe Magnum Destination Portfolio simplication in 2022 (~200 products) with Supply Chain and Operations team.

Manage high-level stakeholders' pre-alignments and meetings to drive critical decisions for innovation projects. 

In charge of training interns on Ice Cream Day project management skills and analytical reports.", 'title': 'Brand Project Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Unilever', 'description': 'Led the Home Care Lifebuoy launch with Turnover worth EUR 30M to unlock sanitization agenda and provide disinfection cleaning products Globally during COVID-19 pandemic.

Managed EU Innovation projects to land the expansion of Domestos Disinfectant Toilet cleaners to Multipurpose cleaners range, contributing to promote safe disinfection for families & kids.

Led "Home Care Clean Choice/Less plastic” agenda for Domestos Core range, delivering the accretive Business Case & validation of 50% PCR packaging across Bleach range to meet Plastic tax deadline, utilizing 4.2Mio Metric tonnes of PCR plastic by Q1/2022. 

Managed the Future Core (Domestos Power Fresh and Zero Limescale) relaunch worth 2.5M iTO with critical Regulatory & Time constraints, encouraged team members to meet network timing with limited resources and always eager to learn more from different functions and finetune product mix following consumer needs and market trends. Revamp the range with new Visual Identity across Europe.', 'title': 'Senior Assistant Brand Manager - Domestos EU & New Business Launch', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Unilever', 'description': 'Led Innovation Projects on new Hygiene and Clean Choice product launch with Turnover of €20M (incrementality €5M) across Europe and Indonesia. 
Launched the first Unilever Disinfectant Aerosol spray range in Greece and South Easter European country.

Managed roll-outs of communication campaigns, assets management, 7Omni channels in Europe
Managed relationships and workflows with ad agencies

Managed Artwork, operations, end to end innovation product life cycles with cross functional teams. 

As project leader, coordinate between supply chain, factory and artwork team to deliver quality, cost-saving and timely Artwork and packaging results.

Lead Consumer test research with agency, conduct monthly Market Share review analysis with Nielsen and Kantar data tools, Competitors review of FMCG industry, Green product competitors.

Support Innovation products launching, coordinated with local launch countries, R&D, legal, third party factory and supply chain planner to push forward the launch of new product.', 'title': 'Global Assistant Brand Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 124554, 'name': 'UNStudio', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHySuswuR7Mbg/company-logo_400_400/0/1623418618928?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=tTd0v_EKknHWSPvLtrbcjvU0EiRIbsMeno3XS_qj63A', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unstudio/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'UNStudio', 'description': '•	Manage Social media channels to enhance business development of the company
